# EDA

Column
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart 1

```{r}
data <- read.csv("Data/Data - DS C1 Course.csv")
```

```{r}
df_paid <- data %>% group_by(Do.you.understand.that.this.is.a.paid.course..) %>% count()
ggplot(df_paid, aes(x = Do.you.understand.that.this.is.a.paid.course.., y = n)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill = "blue")
```
### Count of Age/Gender

```{r}
df_Age <- data %>% group_by(Age) %>% count()
ggplot(df_Age, aes(x = Age, y = n)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill = "red")
```
